name: Zipline by RG Team
description:
Player!  Your mission is to guide the Stickman safely through all the obstacles in its path.  Use Tap(s) for this.   Let's go! Good Luck!

RG Team Members:

  1. Коротков Савелий Владимирович - Геймдизайнер
  2. Капитан Виталий Юрьевич - Программист

In our project, we have used free resources:

1) Birds

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/birds-3a9bb97be78944f9bffc23fb25c2154e

2) Stickman

https://free3d.com/3d-model/stickman-with-fingers-29144.html?__cf_chl_jschl_tk__...

3) Polygonal's Low-Poly Particle Pack (Unity Asset)

4) POLYGON Starter Pack - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty (Unity Asset)

5) Music by Zen_Man from Pixabay
